vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ὑπερεκ-τείνω,
stretch out beyond measure, ἑαυτούς [NT]:—passive, stretch out beyond, [Refs 5th c.AD+]; πόλλ᾽ ὑπερεξετάθης conjecture for πουλὺ παρεξ- in [Refs 6th c.AD+]
vocabInfos.shortDef: to go too far, overextend, stretch out beyond
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to go too far, overextend, stretch out beyond
to overextend, overstretch, go to far, stretch out beyond 2Cor. 10:14*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: ir más allás ; salirse de los límites o autoridad, rebasar los límites
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition: 超過原定的界線, 延展至量度之外, 過度延伸 (林後 10:14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition: 超过原定的界线, 延展至量度之外, 过度延伸 (林后 10:14)
